altername_name: The Millenium European Paintball Series: Championship Paintball 2009
name: NPPL Championship Paintball 2009
overview: The intensity of first-person-shooters and extreme sports collide in NPPL's Championship Paintball 2009. Feel the adrenaline of intense tournament and woodsball action like never before as you take your game to the next level. With the most authentic and realistic paintball game to date, you'll feel like you're right in the action. Realistic ballistics and physics attributes applied to bunkers and paintball trajectories All-new field creator feature allows you to design your very own unique field layouts.
